page.title: 13Landscape and Building
page.content: 1){The Church of the Holy Cross {(Gt.Ponton)}Mainly 15th. Century but there is some 13th century work in the chancel.The tower was built by Anthony Ellis in 1519 in celebration of freedom from religious persecution. NB:note the unusual weather vane. {2) St.Guthlacs Churh(Little Ponton)} Very small church built in the 13th century.Bell visible from the road. {3) Little Ponton Hall} Rectangular,2 storey,building with central courtyard.Present owner is Lady Sarah McCorquodale.(Sister of Princess Diana). {4) Rectory(Gt.Ponton)} Built by Athony Ellis,a merchant of the Staples of Calais.Early 16th century wall painting traverses whole of upper floor.
